From: Garett [mailto:osmosis@...]

Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Spell Quests...


> Enchanters use pages (often there's a left and right half) and faded
pages.
> The faded pages have to be restored before you use them. Restoring is
done
> in one kind of container and combining pages is done in another (both
found
> in your guild probably on the tiny dagger merchant).
>

Um.... I've been using a single book, the tomb of endless enchantments I
believe, to do both my research and my restoration of faded pages. It never
fails, except when it doesnt work.

Cogg - RZ
